trans-unit.source: When set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> control attempts to render a shortcut to invoke the default command.
trans-unit.target: 設定時，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>控制項嘗試呈現叫用的預設命令的捷徑。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: In HTML, the default rendering in list view displays the first field as a link to the details view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTML 中，在清單檢視中的預設轉譯會第一個欄位顯示為<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>的詳細資料檢視的連結

trans-unit.source: When the DefaultCommand property is set, clicking the link invokes the default command.
trans-unit.target: 當 DefaultCommand 屬性設定時，按一下連結會叫用的預設命令。

trans-unit.source: Invoking the default command raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 叫用的預設命令引發<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs> object is set to the value of the DefaultCommand property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs>物件設定為 DefaultCommand 屬性的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Even if a default command is defined, you should include a command with the same name in the commands collection.
trans-unit.target: 即使定義預設的命令，您應該具有相同名稱的命令集合中包含的命令。

trans-unit.source: If the control cannot render a graphical element that includes a shortcut for the default command, the default command is still available through the rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> commands collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項無法呈現圖形元素包含預設命令的捷徑，預設值命令，還是可以透過呈現<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>命令集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: The name of the default command.

trans-unit.source: In addition, it lists all the commands associated with an item.

trans-unit.source: For some devices, this view also contains a link that returns the user to the list view.

trans-unit.source: When you render an object list by using templates, the ItemCommand event handler is called through the event-bubbling mechanism of ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用範本轉譯的物件清單時，ItemCommand 事件處理常式是透過事件反昇機制呼叫的 ASP.NET。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is passed an argument of type <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs>, which contains information about the source item and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the control that generated the event.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to render a single item with multiple associated interactions.

trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下連結時，型別引數呼叫 ItemCommand 事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs>，其中包含來源項目的相關資訊。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property in code is not persisted between requests, so if you want the style to be consistently set, you must set the property on each request.

trans-unit.source: If the property is set declaratively, the property is persisted between requests.
trans-unit.target: 如果以宣告方式設定屬性，屬性會保存在要求之間。

trans-unit.source: In addition, setting the property declaratively allows you to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific>/`Choice` structure to set the property for various devices.

trans-unit.source: The `More` link is rendered to provide a link from the `ListView` of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> to the `DetailsView` of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: `More`連結會轉譯提供的連結，`ListView`的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>至`DetailsView`的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: The following conditions must be met for the `More` link to be rendered: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A> property must be set.
trans-unit.target: 必須符合下列條件`More`要呈現的連結:-<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A>屬性必須設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: - There must be additional fields or commands to be rendered in the details view.
trans-unit.target: -必須有額外的欄位或命令，在詳細資料檢視中轉譯。

trans-unit.source: The default rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> displays the first field in the `ListView` as a link to the `DetailsView` page.
trans-unit.target: 預設呈現<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>顯示的第一個欄位`ListView`連結為`DetailsView`頁面。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A> property overrides this link and causes it to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A>屬性會覆寫此連結，並與引發它<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the `More` link is rendered to provide a link to the `DetailsView`.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，`More`連結會轉譯到提供的連結`DetailsView`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is not the same as the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DetailsCommandText%2A> property, which is used on WAP browsers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不相同<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DetailsCommandText%2A>WAP 瀏覽器所用的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DetailsCommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text string used for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_More" name="More" href=""></xref> link used on HTML browsers to navigate to the details view.

trans-unit.source: Contains <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if more than one item can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 包含<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以選取一個以上的項目。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it contains <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，就會包含<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if item is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目已選取;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text used for the command to select more items in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得命令用來選取多個項目中的文字<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: The text used for the command to select more items in an object list.
trans-unit.target: 若要在物件清單中選取多個項目使用命令的文字。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the commands related to an item in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref> are shown.
trans-unit.target: 在項目相關的命令之前發生<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>列示如下。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The event argument contains a reference to the item and to the collection of commands.
trans-unit.target: 事件引數包含參考的項目和命令的集合。

trans-unit.source: An event handler can customize the collection according to the item.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式可以自訂根據項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Applications can use the ShowItemCommands event to provide functionality equivalent to item-specific shortcut menus.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可以使用 ShowItemCommands 事件提供的功能相當於特定項目捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the collection of commands during this event are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: 命令的集合，在此事件期間所做的變更不會保存。

trans-unit.source: This event is called after the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemSelect> event is called.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件之後，就會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemSelect>事件被呼叫。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemSelect>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform other tasks before showing the detail view.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此事件，以顯示詳細資料檢視之前執行其他工作。

trans-unit.source: You can add, remove, or rearrange fields, depending on the item selected in the list view.
trans-unit.target: 您可以新增、 移除或重新排列欄位，根據清單檢視中選取的項目。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: The optional event argument to be passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性事件引數傳遞至事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of indices within the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields*> collection of the fields in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.TableFields*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得陣列的索引內<> *> 中的欄位集合<> *> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> control has not been bound to a data source or no items have been added, the TableFieldIndices property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>TableFieldIndices 屬性控制項具有未繫結到資料來源，或尚未加入任何項目，傳回`null`。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: An array of integers representing the indices of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 表示索引的整數陣列<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields*>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which fields are visible when the list view is shown in table mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定清單檢視會顯示在表格模式下時，會顯示哪些欄位。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: This string must be a set of identifiers, separated by semicolons.
trans-unit.target: 這個字串必須是一組識別碼，並以分號分隔。

trans-unit.source: Each identifier indicates the name or data field of the field that will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 每個識別項表示將會顯示欄位的名稱或資料欄位。

trans-unit.source: By default, the list view is never shown in table mode unless this property is not empty.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，清單檢視是永遠不會顯示在表格模式中除非這個屬性不是空。

trans-unit.source: A semicolon-delimited list of fields to be displayed when the list view is shown in table mode.
trans-unit.target: 以分號分隔的清單檢視會顯示在表格模式下時所要顯示的欄位清單。

trans-unit.source: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 導致加入伺服器控制項的檢視狀態變更追蹤，因此它們可以儲存在伺服器控制項的<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件是透過可存取<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*>

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the view mode of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定檢視模式的<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The following options are available for this property through the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 透過這個屬性有下列選項<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode>

trans-unit.source: |Member Name|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode>|This is the default view displayed when the page containing the object list is rendered for the first time.
trans-unit.target: |成員名稱 |描述 | |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode>|這是包含物件清單的頁面轉譯第一次時顯示的預設檢視。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode>

trans-unit.source: It consists of either the label fields of the items, or if the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.TableFields%2A> property is not empty, a table with columns corresponding to the table fields and rows for the items.
trans-unit.target: 它會包含標籤的欄位項目，或如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.TableFields%2A>屬性不是空白，對應於表格欄位的資料行的資料表和資料列的項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.TableFields%2A>

trans-unit.source: In HTML, this view is combined with the Commands view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the list.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTML 中，這個檢視結合命令檢視，顯示為超連結，清單下方的命令。

trans-unit.source: When there is more information in the Details view, a hyperlink for each item displaying the Details view is rendered.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode>|In HTML, this view is combined with the Commands view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the details.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode>|This view is rendered separately only for WML devices.
trans-unit.target: 在詳細資料檢視的詳細資訊時，會轉譯超連結顯示詳細資料檢視每個項目。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode>|在 HTML 中，此檢視就會結合 [命令] 檢視中，顯示為超連結，詳細資料如下的命令。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode>|此檢視會分別轉譯僅適用於 WML 裝置。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode>

trans-unit.source: It consists of a menu with the commands of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: 它包含使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>命令功能表

trans-unit.source: For HTML devices, the List view and Details view are each combined with this view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the details or list.| > [!NOTE] > To set this property in code, an item in the list must be selected before setting this property to <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode> view.
trans-unit.target: HTML 裝置的清單檢視與 詳細資料檢視會每個結合此檢視中，顯示為超連結，詳細資料或清單下方的命令。 | > [!NOTE] > 程式碼中設定此屬性，您必須選取清單中的項目才能將此屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode>或<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode>檢視。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode>

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property before selecting an item throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試選取項目就會擲回的例外狀況之前設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: A view mode is persisted in a private view state, so that, regardless of whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> object is `true`, the view mode is persisted as a private field.
trans-unit.target: 檢視模式中保存的私用檢視狀態，因此，無論<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>物件是`true`，檢視模式會保存為私用欄位。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property is `false`, the items collection is not persisted between requests, requiring a data bind to be repeated for each request.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>屬性是`false`，項目集合不會保存需要針對每個要求重複的資料繫結的要求之間。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode"></xref> value representing the view mode of the object list.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode"> </xref>代表的物件清單檢視模式的值。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode"></xref> while no item was selected.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將此屬性設為值以外<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode"></xref>時已不選取任何項目。
